ad_name: The Center For Sinus And Nasal Disease
ad_copy: Can't breathe without them? Over-the-counter nasal sprays and decongestants provide only temporary relief, delay diagnosis, and postpone proper treatment -- and may lead to more serious health disorders. Throw away those over-the-counter medications...and call The Center For Sinus & Nasal Disease today. 1-800-MD-SINUS.

If you're paying too much for your prescriptions, generics may work as well as brand names. Tell your physician and pharmacist everything you're taking. Some medicines don't interact well. Remember, no matter what an ad says about a drug, it may not be right for you. AARP reminds you to check up on your prescriptions.

Vioxx is here. 24-hour relief for the most common type of arthritis pain, osteoarthritis. It isn't about winning a marathon. Or making you fell like a kid again. It's about controlling the pain that keeps you from doing every day things.

Carilion Roanoke Memorial Hospital is proud to be Virginia's first accredited Chest Pain Center. So when you come in with chest pain or other symptoms of a heart attack, such as pain in the arm or jaw, Carilion makes every second count. Carilion is saving lives. Call 266-6000 or visit carilion.com for more information.

Here's a remarkable fact: doctors do not find 90% of all breast lumps. Women who test themselves by performing a monthly breast self-examination find them. Fortunately, 80% of the lumps women find are not breast cancer. Saint Barnabas Cancer Center.

ad_name: University of Utah Health Cardiovascular Center
ad_copy: Heart disease can happen to anyone. If it happens to you, trust the experts at the University of Utah Health Cardiovascular Center to keep you healthy. To find out your risk for heart disease or to learn more about the signs and symptoms, visit U of U health
